overview: This History Channel documentary investigates the intriguing possibility that fabled Wild West outlaw Jesse James, who robbed scores of banks for more than a decade after the Civil War, used his loot to fund a resurgence of Confederate sympathizers. As dedicated investigators mount a search for a stash of leftover coins, gold and other valuables that James stole, they also uncover new evidence regarding the outlaw's life and death.
title: Jesse James' Hidden Treasure
